Termitron::

"I don't want hurt you, 'cause you're Royalty's friend" said 
Termitron "But he's guilty for betrays Queen, guilty again to try to 
kill her, and guilty to Betray Colony... Why is necesary a trial?"

> ::Aerotaur::
>     "Calm down Termitron!  Now is not the time for infighting.  Do 
you want

give him a
